pr_title: Show notifications when disk in the Elasticsearch nodes fills up

timeline.message: Show notifications when disk in the Elasticsearch nodes fills up based on the disk allocation settings.
Show notifications when disk in the Elasticsearch nodes fills up based on the disk allocation settings.
FloodStage should be optional due to be a new watermark in Elasticsearch 6 not present in Elasticsearch 5
